title: British Court Orders Dubai Ruler to Pay £554 Million in Custody Settlement
content:
1. British Court Orders Dubai Ruler to Pay £554 Million in Custody Settlement  The New York Times
  2. Princess Paid Bodyguard $9M in Blackmail to Keep Their Affair Quiet, but Still Got Busted  The Daily Beast
  3. Dubai ruler must provide $733 million to settle U.K. custody case  NBC News
  4. Court orders Dubai ruler to pay ex-wife $728m -- one of the UK's largest ever divorce settlements  CNN
  5. Ruler of Dubai ordered to pay record $730M to ex-wife and their kids  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
